comments.author: hZti
comments.created_time: December 05, 2022, 01:28:32 PMLast edit: December 05, 2022, 04:49:35 PM by hZti
comments.body: Is this a serious question? The best Option is obviously to simply get a Job and with the earnings buy bitcoin. If you gamble etc. you will only reach your goal of 1BTC if you buy 2BTC in the first place.

comments.author: coupable
comments.body: Collecting 1 Bitcoin is like collecting any other amount of money.  Both deserve a job and make an effort and get paid for it.  Maybe the easiest way to do this is to invest successfully in a specific project, but it is not easy to identify these successful projects or to distinguish them among the thousands of investment opportunities in the market.  This would be a kind of gambling, but with better guarantees, perhaps.  I do not know for how long you want to collect this amount, but logically the amount is relatively large and it will take some time to collect it, whatever method you adopt.  I think it is better to move this topic to the beginners section, because that is the best place for such questions.

comments.author: pooya87
comments.body: You have to acquire money and then convert that money to bitcoin! DUH!Here are some ideas on how to acquire money:1. Get a job! Get paid! Invest a certain portion of your paycheck in bitcoin.2. Get a secondary job to earn some extra cash. It could be anything like live streaming games on Twitch or whatever you can think of and suits your skills.3. Manage your expenses better so that you are left with some extra money. For example if you waste your money on smokes, stop smoking and buy bitcoin with that money that you used to waste.4. Sell stuff you don't need like a garage sale or something. For example if you have a second hand bike laying around that you won't use, sell that and use the money to buy bitcoin.This way, slowly but surely you'll accumulate bitcoin. Specially now that we are in a big dip and bitcoin is undervalued.

Genuine method and i know it will take time."Investing is a long term one" China wall not made in one day"Do you mean free geniun way of collecting of 1BTC or using your money ?If you mean free method then there are some legit site that you do some tasks and you get rewarded in BTC.Then if it's investment wise you're talking about, then you have to first identify how much you can afford to loose from your earnings if you have one, Then invest using dollar cost averaging (DCA) on weekly, monthly basis or whichever way that suits you since you've understood that is not an overnight something, good.With this method I do believe you will one day achieve the goal of owing 1 BTC no matter how long that it will take you.

comments.author: Marvell1
comments.body: It's like if you want to save fiat, the best way is to work hard and save spending on unnecessary things, then you will save some money and convert that money into bitcoins and you actively do so, you will soon join the 1BTC club. There are many ways to collect bitcoin and I think you should do your own research to see which works best for you as it is difficult to give you specific advice. But there is one thing I want to tell you, it is very different for you to hold 1 BTC and hold $20k for a long time. So I advise you to take advantage of when bitcoin is still cheap, so collect as much as possible, and don't leave too much money in your bank account when you can buy more bitcoins.
